description: This super fast and easy Sausage and Vegetable Skillet is the ultimate busy-day meal and is perfect for meal prep!
keywords: frozen vegetable recipes, meal prep recipes
name: Sausage and Vegetable Skillet
recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp seasoning salt or seasoning blend (or to taste) ($0.05)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cooking oil and sausage to a skillet. Cook the sausage over medium heat until brown and crispy.
Add the cauliflower, peppers and onions, and kale to the skillet with the sausage. Continue to stir and cook until the vegetables are heated through.
Add a liberal amount (or to taste) of your favorite seasoning salt or seasoning blend and stir to combine. Serve hot.
